### concat_traj { #kimmdy.misc_helper.concat_traj }

`misc_helper.concat_traj(run_dir, out=None, run_types=None)`

Find and concatenate trajectories from KIMMDY runs.

#### Parameters

| Name        | Type                | Description                                                                                       | Default    |
|-------------|---------------------|---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------|------------|
| `run_dir`   | pathlib.Path \| str | Directory containing directories of multiple tasks.                                               | _required_ |
| `out`       | Path                | File Path into the output trr will be written. Default `concat.trr` in given run_dir              | `None`     |
| `run_types` | list                | List of tasks to get trrs from. If a task is not in this list it will be skipped. By default None | `None`     |
